bibl.title: Letter from Emma G. Kane to the President of Johns Hopkins Hospital, January 14, 1914

div1.p: Kane requests a photograph of Jesse Lazear.

div1.head: Letter from Emma G. Kane to the President of Johns Hopkins Hospital, January 14, 1914
div1.opener:
Form 16 7,12 10M.
For Mrs. Swetzer
OAKLAND SCHOOL DEPARTMENT
{Lazear} SCHOOL {Jan 14} 191{4}
Pres. John Hopkins Hospital,
Baltimore.
Dear Sir.
div1.p:
We have named one
of our new schools in honor of Dr. Jesse
W. Lazear. I desire his photo for our
building. Can you inform me where
I could get one? If you know of
the place of residence of any of his
family I should like to know.

Any information concerning him would
be most acceptable.
div1.closer:
Respectfully (Miss) Emma G. Kane
Principal.
Lazear School
Cor E 9 St- 26 Ave
Oakland
California.
